- [ ] Support activity and quality
  - Approved/Rejected by: @
- [ ] Documentation quality
  - Approved/Rejected by: @
- [ ] Modlist has custom patching
  - Approved/Rejected by: @
- [ ] No obvious unresolved conflicts
  - Approved/Rejected by: @
- [ ] No frequent crashes or repeatable bugs
  - Approved/Rejected by: @
